rules.natural: Either a regulatory violation has been found at the company, or if the clinical trial for the treatment was successful, then the product has been approved by the regulator.
Provided that a financial penalty is imposed on the company, then it is not the case that a regulatory violation has been found at the company.
Whenever the company’s license is suspended, then it is not the case that a regulatory violation has been found at the company.
Under the condition that an audit has been conducted at the company, a financial penalty is imposed on the company.
Either an audit has been conducted at the company, or the company has failed inspection.
If the company has failed inspection, then the company’s license is suspended.
Either there is a supply shortage in the region, or regulatory compliance has been achieved by the company.
Whenever production resumes at the facility, operations are restored at the facility.
If a product recall has been issued, then manufacturing production has been halted.
Either a product recall has been issued, or the raw material is not contaminated.

Provided that the contingency plan is activated by the company, then if it is not the case that whenever operations are restored at the facility, either an alternative supplier is found or there is no supply shortage in the region, then there is no market disruption in the region.
Either the contingency plan is activated by the company, or crisis management is implemented by the company.

Either stakeholder confidence is lost among investors, or if crisis management is implemented by the company, then if it is not the case that whenever operations are restored at the facility, either an alternative supplier is found or there is no supply shortage in the region, then there is no market disruption in the region.
Under the condition that the company maintains its profit margin, regulatory compliance is achieved by the company.
Either the company’s stock price has dropped, or the company has maintained its profit margin.
If an investor lawsuit is filed against the company, then it is not the case that the company’s stock price has dropped.
Provided that there is a shareholder revolt at the company, then it is not the case that the company’s stock price has dropped.
If a manufacturing error has been detected in the process, then if a product recall is issued, it is not the case that manufacturing production has been halted.
Under the condition that process improvement is implemented in the process, corrective action has been taken on the process.
If the quality control team is alerted, then if it is not the case that a manufacturing error has been detected in the process, process improvement is implemented in the process.
Either the quality control team is alerted, or the technical staff are notified.
Whenever logistics operations are optimized, the supply chain is secured.
Either logistics operations are optimized, or transportation has been arranged for distribution.
If transportation has been arranged for distribution, then if production has resumed at the facility, either an alternative supplier has been found or there is no supply shortage in the region.

Under the condition that the batch has passed quality assurance, then if it is not the case that whenever a product recall is issued, it is not the case that manufacturing production has been halted, then an investigation into the incident has not been opened.
Provided that the product has been approved by the regulator, regulatory compliance is achieved by the company.
If emergency approval has been granted for the product, then regulatory compliance is achieved by the company.
Either the clinical trial for the treatment was successful, or the treatment received fast-track approval.
Under the condition that the treatment receives fast-track approval, emergency approval is granted for the product.

If it is not the case that whenever operations are restored at the facility, either an alternative supplier is found or there is no supply shortage in the region, then there is market disruption in the region.
If it is not the case that whenever a product recall is issued, it is not the case that manufacturing production has been halted, then an investigation into the incident has been opened.
If it is not the case that either an investor lawsuit is filed against the company or there is a shareholder revolt at the company, then the company is undergoing board restructuring.

Provided that it is not the case that either an investor lawsuit is filed against the company or there is a shareholder revolt at the company, then it is not the case that the company is undergoing board restructuring.

If it is not the case that whenever the technical staff are notified, then if it is not the case that a manufacturing error has been detected in the process, process improvement is implemented in the process, then external consultants have been hired.

Under the condition that it is not the case that whenever the technical staff are notified, then if it is not the case that a manufacturing error has been detected in the process, process improvement is implemented in the process, then it is not the case that external consultants have been hired.
Whenever it is not the case that regulatory compliance has been achieved by the company, the raw material is contaminated.
